languages.text: {n}Бой окончен, и на часовню опускается тишина. Хлопья пепла кружат в воздухе, оседая в растекающейся по полу крови.{/n}
{n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бой окончен, и на часовню опускается тишина. Хлопья пепла кружат в воздухе, оседая в растекающейся по полу крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The battle is over, and silence descends on the chapel. Flakes of ash swirl in the air and slowly settle into the blood spreading across the floor.{/n}
{n}The battle is over, and silence descends on the chapel. Flakes of ash swirl in the air and slowly settle into the blood spreading across the floor.{/n}
{n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}
{n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}
{n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}
{n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Kampf ist vorbei, und die Kapelle ist wieder von Stille erfüllt. Ascheflocken treiben geräuschlos durch die Luft und setzen sich dann auf dem Blut ab, das über den Boden fließt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kampf ist vorbei, und die Kapelle ist wieder von Stille erfüllt. Ascheflocken treiben geräuschlos durch die Luft und setzen sich dann auf dem Blut ab, das über den Boden fließt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El combate ha terminado, y una vez más reina el silencio en la capilla. La ceniza revolotea en el aire antes de depositarse sobre la sangre que fluye lentamente por el suelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El combate ha terminado, y una vez más reina el silencio en la capilla. La ceniza revolotea en el aire antes de depositarse sobre la sangre que fluye lentamente por el suelo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}戦いが終わり、静寂が再び礼拝堂に訪れた。灰の欠片が静かに宙を舞い、床をゆっくりと流れる血の上にピタリと止まる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}戦いが終わり、静寂が再び礼拝堂に訪れた。灰の欠片が静かに宙を舞い、床をゆっくりと流れる血の上にピタリと止まる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}战斗结束了，礼拜堂再次被沉寂笼罩。灰烬在空气中静静地打着旋，落在地板上不断流淌的血泊之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}战斗结束了，礼拜堂再次被沉寂笼罩。灰烬在空气中静静地打着旋，落在地板上不断流淌的血泊之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le combat terminé, le silence règne à nouveau entre les murs de la chapelle. Une pluie de cendres tourbillonne dans l'air avant de se poser sur le sang qui goutte lentement sur le sol.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le combat terminé, le silence règne à nouveau entre les murs de la chapelle. Une pluie de cendres tourbillonne dans l'air avant de se poser sur le sang qui goutte lentement sur le sol.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çatışma sona eriyor ve şapel bir kez daha sessizleşiyor. Havada sessizce savrulan toz zerreleri yavaşça yere damlayan kanın üzerine çöküyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The battle is over, and silence descends once again upon the chapel. Flakes of ash whirl quietly in the air before coming to rest on the blood trickling slowly across the floor.{/n}
